translation.en: I'm Dan Schneider.
translation.it: Sono Dan Schneider.

translation.en: And I'm a pharmacist.
translation.it: E sono un farmacista.

translation.en: I can almost remember every piece of my life.
translation.it: Ricordo quasi ogni pezzo della mia vita.

translation.en: And it's kind of a crazy story.
translation.it: È una storia assurda.

translation.en: [crew member] If you keep it focused, we can go from the beginning.
translation.it: Se ti concentri, possiamo ripartire dall'inizio.

translation.en: Okay, I can tell... I can try to tell a story, but how far do you want me to go before I stop?
translation.it: Posso provare a raccontare una storia, ma a che punto vuoi che smetta?

translation.en: You know, what's your next question?
translation.it: Qual è la prossima domanda?

translation.en: [crew member] You can go all the way to...
translation.it: Puoi andare fino a...

translation.en: -Okay, okay. I'll try, I'll try. -[indistinct chatter]
translation.it: Ok, ci proverò.

translation.en: I've never tried to be an actor though. -Don't be an actor. You're a real guy! -[laughs]
translation.it: - Non ho mai fatto l'attore. - Non farlo. Sei una persona vera!

translation.en: [Dan] I guess some people would call me...
translation.it: Qualcuno mi chiamerebbe...

translation.en: obsessive, if you want to call it that.
translation.it: ...ossessivo, se vogliamo.

translation.en: You know, I have, like, hundreds of hours of videos and cassette tapes from wiretapping phone conversations...
translation.it: Ho centinaia di ore di video e cassette di intercettazioni telefoniche

translation.en: about what happened to me.
translation.it: su ciò che mi è successo.

translation.en: [Dan] Let me just tell you something.
translation.it: Voglio dirle una cosa.

translation.en: It was very inappropriate, the way the police went about doing what they did.
translation.it: È stato molto inopportuno, il modo di agire della polizia.

translation.en: [man] Well, once again, Mr. Schneider, I resent the implication.
translation.it: Signor Schneider... Non tollero le implicazioni.

translation.en: [Dan] My son was murdered...
translation.it: Mio figlio è stato ucciso...

translation.en: buying crack in the Lower 9th Ward.
translation.it: ...mentre comprava crack nel Lower 9th Ward.

translation.en: The police have the attitude that it's another drug deal gone bad.
translation.it: La polizia pensa che sia stata una trattativa andata male.

translation.en: And these kids maybe got what they deserved.
translation.it: E che i ragazzi se la siano cercata.

translation.en: [man] You are not going to dictate to me. I'm talking.
translation.it: Lei non mi darà ordini. Parlo io.

translation.en: [woman] You don't talk to people like that who just lost a son. We lost a son.
translation.it: Non parli così a chi ha appena perso un figlio, come noi.

translation.en: We just lost a son. He didn't lose a son, okay?
translation.it: Noi abbiamo appena perso un figlio. Lui no, ok?

translation.en: He didn't lose a son!
translation.it: Non ha perso un figlio!

translation.en: [Dan] The New Orleans Police Department was corrupt
translation.it: Il Dipartimento di Polizia di New Orleans era corrotto,

translation.en: and almost none of the murders
translation.it: Il Dipartimento di Polizia di New Orleans era corrotto, non risolvevano mai i casi di omicidio.

translation.en: were ever solved.
translation.it: non risolvevano mai i casi di omicidio.

translation.en: But I was determined to get the killer off the street
translation.it: Ma ero deciso a togliere il killer dalla strada

translation.en: and if the police wasn't gonna do it, I was gonna do it.
translation.it: e se non lo avesse fatto la polizia lo avrei fatto io.

translation.en: [reporter 1] In other news, a St. Bernard family is on a campaign for justice.
translation.it: Una famiglia di San Bernardo sta facendo una campagna per la giustizia.

translation.en: [Dan] I wasn't gonna let 'em knock me down.
translation.it: Non mi avrebbero dissuaso.

translation.en: Twenty-three-year-old Danny Schneider was gunned down in his pickup truck.
translation.it: A Danny Schneider, 23 anni, hanno sparato nel suo furgone.

translation.en: Police say that they have little to go on.
translation.it: La polizia dice di avere pochi indizi.

translation.en: Schneider's parents are grief-stricken.
translation.it: I genitori sono distrutti.

translation.en: [crying] He was a good kid.
translation.it: Era un bravo ragazzo.

translation.en: He didn't deserve this.
translation.it: Non se lo meritava.

translation.en: In my fight to get Danny some justice,
translation.it: Nella mia lotta per fare giustizia per Danny,

translation.en: I promise I will work hard...
translation.it: prometto che lavorerò sodo...

translation.en: to try to save other lives.
translation.it: ...per salvare altre vite.

translation.en: At first, my mission was to get justice for my son.
translation.it: All'inizio volevo giustizia per mio figlio.

translation.en: But then I started noticing, in the drugstore,
translation.it: Ma poi ho iniziato a notare, in farmacia,

translation.en: an unusual amount of high-powered opiate prescriptions.
translation.it: una quantità insolita di prescrizioni di oppiacei ad alta potenza.

translation.en: [reporter 2] Chalmette pharmacist Daniel Schneider says
translation.it: Il farmacista di Chalmette, Daniel Schneider,

translation.en: he's taken a leave of absence from his drugstore job
translation.it: ha preso un permesso dal suo negozio

translation.en: to crusade against the illegal use of OxyContin.
translation.it: per combattere l'uso illegale di OxyContin.

translation.en: [Dan] There was a certain doctor using her license
translation.it: Una certa dottoressa usava la sua licenza

translation.en: to virtually decimate my community.
translation.it: per decimare la mia comunità.

translation.en: -Not only did I see malpractice... -[pills shake] ...I saw corruption, I saw conspiracy.
translation.it: Non solo ho visto negligenza, ho visto corruzione, ho visto complotti.

translation.en: People were dying every week.
translation.it: La gente moriva ogni settimana.

translation.en: -[cameras clicking] -Eighteen, and 20, and 25-year-old kids.
translation.it: Ragazzi di 18, 20, 25 anni.

translation.en: I could see my son's face in their face.
translation.it: Nei loro visi vedevo il viso di mio figlio.

translation.en: -[sirens wail] -[voice breaking] I couldn't save my son.
translation.it: Non ho salvato mio figlio.

translation.en: But I can save some other kids.
translation.it: Ma posso salvare altri ragazzi.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna let this drug continue to kill.
translation.it: E non lascerò che questa droga continui a uccidere.

translation.en: I started realizing that there was a bigger mission here.
translation.it: Ho iniziato a capire che c'era una missione più grande.

translation.en: OxyContin. It was produced by Purdue Pharma.
translation.it: OxyContin. Era prodotto dalla Purdue Pharma.

translation.en: -And I saw this opiate epidemic... -[pills rattle] ...in its infancy.
translation.it: E ho visto questa epidemia di oppiacei muovere i primi passi.

translation.en: We were creating addicts all over this country.
translation.it: Stavamo creando tossicodipendenti in tutto il Paese.

translation.en: Purdue could have done things to stop this,
translation.it: La Purdue avrebbe potuto fermare tutto,

translation.en: but they saw the profits.
translation.it: ma vide i profitti.

translation.en: Not only were they white-collar criminals...
translation.it: Non erano solo criminali finanziari...

translation.en: they were white-collar murderers.
translation.it: ...erano assassini.

translation.en: My son's killer paid a price.
translation.it: L'assassino di mio figlio ha pagato.

translation.en: What about Purdue Pharma? What price have they paid?
translation.it: E la Purdue Pharma? Che prezzo ha pagato?

translation.en: They gave birth to a crisis that killed hundreds of thousands of people.
translation.it: Ha scatenato una crisi che ha ucciso centinaia di migliaia di persone.

translation.en: -What price have they paid? -[dramatic instrumentals fade]
translation.it: Che prezzo ha pagato?

translation.en: [Dan] St. Bernard Parish, it's right next to New Orleans.
translation.it: St. Bernard Parish è proprio accanto a New Orleans.

translation.en: We used to call it God's Country.
translation.it: Lo chiamavamo il Paese di Dio.

translation.en: Kind of sandwiched between the Mississippi River and, really, the swamps.
translation.it: Chiuso a panino tra il fiume Mississippi e le paludi.

translation.en: St. Bernard was basically middle-class.
translation.it: San Bernardo era di ceto medio.

translation.en: We have two major oil refineries,
translation.it: Abbiamo due grandi raffinerie.

translation.en: and fishermen and crabbing and oystering.
translation.it: E pescatori, granchi e ostriche.

translation.en: Somebody's always selling shrimp on the side of the road.
translation.it: E venditori di gamberi sul ciglio della strada.

translation.en: My dad used to take us, when we were little, me and my brother...
translation.it: Da piccoli, mio padre prendeva me e mio fratello,

translation.en: He'd tell us on a Sunday, "We're gonna take a ride to the end of the world."
translation.it: la domenica, e diceva: "Facciamo un giro fino alla fine del mondo".

translation.en: He would drive us down, way down deep into the parish...
translation.it: Guidava verso il centro della contea...

translation.en: past Chalmette, Meraux, Poydras and Violet.
translation.it: ...oltre Chalmette, Meraux, Poydras e Violet.

translation.en: Way down to the end where Delacroix Island was.
translation.it: Fino in fondo, dove c'era l'isola di Delacroix.

translation.en: And it was the Gulf of Mexico.
translation.it: Era il Golfo del Messico.

translation.en: And he'd just say, "Here's the waters."
translation.it: E diceva solo: "Ecco l'acqua.

translation.en: "Here's the Gulf. This is the end of the world to us."
translation.it: Ecco il Golfo. Per noi è la fine del mondo".

translation.en: And we always thought that was the end of the world for everybody.
translation.it: E noi pensavamo che fosse la fine del mondo per tutti.

translation.en: [Dan] I started out in football as a lineman.
translation.it: Ho iniziato nel football come lineman.

translation.en: I actually had pretty good hands and I had great speed.
translation.it: Avevo buone mani e una grande velocità.

translation.en: -[sentimental instrumentals] -But I was blind as a bat.
translation.it: Ma ero cieco come una talpa.

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -We had a tremendous football season.
translation.it: Era stata una stagione strepitosa.

translation.en: When I saw Annie, she was just the cutest thing.
translation.it: Quando ho visto Annie, era la più bella di tutte.

translation.en: [Annie] I was a grade lower than him.
translation.it: Ero un anno più piccola di lui.

translation.en: I liked his personality.
translation.it: Mi piacque la sua personalità.

translation.en: [Dan] I don't think I won her over because of my looks, okay?
translation.it: Non credo di averla conquistata per il mio aspetto.

translation.en: But we just really fell in love with each other.
translation.it: Ma ci siamo davvero innamorati.

translation.en: [Annie] We got married a couple of years after high school.
translation.it: Ci siamo sposati un paio d'anni dopo il liceo.

translation.en: I really didn't know what I wanted to do, to be quite honest with you.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa volessi fare, a dire il vero.

translation.en: A friend of mine talked about the pharmacists having a great job.
translation.it: Mi dissero che il farmacista era un ottimo lavoro.

translation.en: Didn't have a great interest in it. It's just... I had to pick out something real quick
translation.it: Non mi interessava un granché. Dovevo solo scegliere qualcosa

translation.en: where I could reach my goals of having kids and having a house.
translation.it: per raggiungere in fretta i miei obiettivi: dei figli e una casa.

translation.en: I became a pharmacist in 1975.
translation.it: Sono diventato farmacista nel 1975.

translation.en: -[cars rushing] -I worked for Bradley's Pharmacy.
translation.it: Ho lavorato nella farmacia Bradley.

translation.en: You might call it a country drugstore.
translation.it: Potremmo chiamarla "farmacia di campagna".

translation.en: I enjoyed being able to interact with the patients,
translation.it: Mi piaceva interagire con i pazienti,

translation.en: being able to actually feel like I was helping 'em.
translation.it: sentire di starli aiutando davvero.

translation.en: I picked pharmacy and then I... I stuck with it.
translation.it: Ho scelto farmacia e ho continuato.

translation.en: [Dan] Aw, look who had a bath.
translation.it: Guarda chi ha fatto il bagno.

translation.en: [Annie] We waited five years before we had our first child, Danny.
translation.it: Abbiamo aspettato cinque anni prima di avere il primo figlio, Danny.

translation.en: It was wonderful to have a little boy to... play with.
translation.it: Era bellissimo avere un bambino con cui giocare.

translation.en: He was a good kid. Gentle and caring. He was just always happy.
translation.it: Era un bravo bambino. Gentile e premuroso. Era sempre felice.

translation.en: [Dan] Then we had a daughter, Kristi.
translation.it: Poi abbiamo avuto una figlia, Kristi.

translation.en: [Kristi] My family was very, very close, growing up.
translation.it: La mia famiglia era molto unita.

translation.en: We did all kinds of family vacations together.
translation.it: Facevamo un sacco di vacanze di famiglia insieme.

translation.en: [Dan] There's the old Tin Lizzie.
translation.it: Ecco la vecchia Tin Lizzie.

translation.en: [Kristi] It was long travels. We would go across country.
translation.it: Erano lunghi viaggi. Attraversavamo il Paese.

translation.en: [Dan] That's the Shenandoah Valley outlook.
translation.it: È il panorama della Shenandoah Valley.

translation.en: Here we are out in Alabama. It looks like the Alabama tree.
translation.it: Siamo in Alabama. Sembra l'albero dell'Alabama.

translation.en: Many people thought we were like the Griswolds.
translation.it: Molti pensavano che fossimo come i Griswold.

translation.en: [Dan] Here we are. The Griswolds.
translation.it: Eccoci qua. I Griswold.

translation.en: [young Kristi] Shut up!
translation.it: Smettila!

translation.en: [Annie] We had the same type of car they had.
translation.it: Avevamo lo stesso tipo di auto.

translation.en: Danny was like Chevy Chase.
translation.it: Danny era come Chevy Chase.

translation.en: [Dan] Intercourse, Pennsylvania.
translation.it: Intercourse, Pennsylvania.

translation.en: We just seen some Amish people.
translation.it: Abbiamo appena visto degli Amish.

translation.en: -[young Kristi] Amish people. -[hooves clomping]
translation.it: Gli Amish.

translation.en: As a matter of fact, when we had Christmas,
translation.it: A dire il vero, quando era Natale,

translation.en: you know, it was like we used to get this big, giant Christmas tree.
translation.it: compravamo sempre questo gigantesco albero di Natale.

translation.en: A seventeen-foot Christmas tree, we'd have in our house.
translation.it: Un albero di Natale alto cinque metri in casa.

translation.en: It was like Christmas Vacation every Christmas for almost 20 years.
translation.it: Per quasi 20 anni è stato come in Un Natale esplosivo.

translation.en: [Kristi] My dad, every year, wanted to get a tree...
translation.it: Mio padre, ogni anno, voleva un albero...

translation.en: Like the biggest tree you could get. [chuckles]
translation.it: Il più grande che si potesse avere.

translation.en: [Annie] This is 1989.
translation.it: Siamo nel 1989.

translation.en: [Kristi] My friends would come over and relatives would come over and help decorate it.
translation.it: I miei amici e i parenti venivano a casa ad aiutarci a decorarlo.

translation.en: So it was like a family tradition.
translation.it: Era una tradizione di famiglia.

translation.en: [Annie] Okay, wait a minute.
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo.

translation.en: And it just felt like the perfect life.
translation.it: Era una vita perfetta.

translation.en: We didn't want for nothing else. We had everything.
translation.it: Non volevamo altro. Avevamo tutto.

translation.en: [Annie] The Schneider clan.
translation.it: Il clan Schneider.

translation.en: -[Annie] Where are you, son? -[young Danny] Up here.
translation.it: - Dove sei, figliolo? - Quassù.

translation.en: [Annie] Going on the plane from...
translation.it: Saliamo sull'aereo...

translation.en: [Dan] My son was a really good-natured, compassionate kid.
translation.it: Mio figlio era un ragazzo buono e compassionevole.

translation.en: As he got a little bit older, he really became kind of like a peacenik.
translation.it: Quando fu un po' più grande, diventò un pacifista.

translation.en: [Kristi] He was very creative. He liked to write poems.
translation.it: Era molto creativo. Gli piaceva scrivere poesie.

translation.en: And a lot of my friends had crushes on Danny and it used to aggravate me.
translation.it: Molte mie amiche avevano una cotta per lui, e a me dava fastidio.

translation.en: [Dan] Will he make it? Oh, Lord!
translation.it: Ce la farà? Oh, Signore!

translation.en: -[applause] -Almost!
translation.it: Quasi!

translation.en: Danny was a good dad. He was a doting dad.
translation.it: Danny era un buon padre. Un padre affettuoso.

translation.en: He made sure, you know, the kids had what they needed and wanted.
translation.it: Dava ai ragazzi ciò di cui avevano bisogno e che desideravano.

translation.en: [Dan] Later on in life, when I had a few pennies, I really wanted a project with Danny.
translation.it: Più avanti, quando ebbi qualche soldo, volevo progettare qualcosa con Danny.

translation.en: Danny and I tore apart this Mustang.
translation.it: Io e Danny abbiamo smontato questa Mustang.

translation.en: Pulled the motor out and worked on, uh, rebuilding the car.
translation.it: Abbiamo tolto il motore e lavorato per ricostruire l'auto.

translation.en: We would go on long rides with that Mustang.
translation.it: Facevamo lunghi giri con la Mustang.

translation.en: We both loved that car.
translation.it: Adoravamo quell'auto.

translation.en: St. Bernard Parish was right down the street below the Lower 9th Ward.
translation.it: St. Bernard Parish si trova in fondo alla strada dal Lower 9th Ward.

translation.en: One day, I took Danny to the Lower 9th Ward, which was in the city.
translation.it: Un giorno, portai Danny al Lower 9th Ward, un rione in città.

translation.en: And we drove and saw the house that my family came from.
translation.it: E vedemmo la casa che era stata della mia famiglia.

translation.en: My family moved out of the 9th Ward
translation.it: La mia famiglia ha lasciato il rione

translation.en: during the era of what you might call the "white flight."
translation.it: durante il periodo dell'Esodo bianco.

translation.en: It was racial.
translation.it: Era razzista.

translation.en: [man] As a child growing up in the city,
translation.it: Quando ero piccolo, in città,

translation.en: a lot of African-Americans started started buying homes in the Lower 9th Ward
translation.it: molti afroamericani iniziarono a comprare casa nel Lower 9th Ward

translation.en: and white Americans moved into St. Bernard.
translation.it: e gli americani bianchi si trasferirono a St. Bernard.

translation.en: And it's like two different worlds.
translation.it: E sono come due mondi diversi.

translation.en: At that time, it was a real, in-your-face type of racism.
translation.it: A quei tempi, il razzismo era spudorato e manifesto.

translation.en: All the time, they would call you a nigger
translation.it: Ti chiamavano sempre negro

translation.en: or they would write it on the car or they would write it on something.
translation.it: o te lo scrivevano sull'auto o su qualcos'altro.

translation.en: That's what we grew up with, you know?
translation.it: Ecco in che ambiente siamo cresciuti.

translation.en: It was basically called a city into a city.
translation.it: In pratica veniva chiamata una città nella città.

translation.en: [Shane] We used to play softball on the levee.
translation.it: Giocavamo a softball sull'argine.

translation.en: We would have little penny parties, waistline parties.
translation.it: Facevamo delle festicciole economiche.

translation.en: As they would say, a wing dang doodle,
translation.it: Delle feste in stile wing dang doodle,

translation.en: when everybody would get together and just basically have fun.
translation.it: in cui si sta insieme e ci si diverte.

translation.en: But, in the '80s, the neighborhood had...
translation.it: Ma negli anni '80, il quartiere era...

translation.en: had totally changed.
translation.it: ...completamente cambiato.

translation.en: [reporter] The housing projects and streets of New Orleans
translation.it: Le case popolari e le strade di New Orleans

translation.en: are filled with people who are hooked on crack cocaine.
translation.it: sono piene di tossicodipendenti da crack.

translation.en: [Terrence] By that time, the crack epidemic was setting in.
translation.it: In quel periodo si stava diffondendo l'epidemia di crack.

translation.en: It just got real bad.
translation.it: Le cose si sono messe male.

translation.en: [man 2] I grew up in the Lower 9th Ward.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto nel Lower 9th Ward.

translation.en: And it was a place...
translation.it: Ed era un posto...

translation.en: that we considered as hell.
translation.it: ...che consideravamo un inferno.

translation.en: You see white folks down here, you...
translation.it: Se vedi dei bianchi, gli chiedi:

translation.en: "Are you not the police? Or are you looking to score something?"
translation.it: "Siete poliziotti? O volete comprare della roba?"

translation.en: The neighborhood that I was in, in the 9th Ward, that's all that came around.
translation.it: Nel mio quartiere, nel nono, venivano solo per questo.

translation.en: They was all from St. Bernard Parish, you know, coming down to buy drugs.
translation.it: Erano tutti di St. Bernard Parish, e venivano a comprare la droga.

translation.en: [Dan] I had been aware at the time that a number of kids from St. Bernard
translation.it: Sapevo che alcuni ragazzi di St. Bernard erano stati uccisi nel 9th Ward

translation.en: had gotten shot to death up in the 9th Ward,
translation.it: di St. Bernard erano stati uccisi nel 9th Ward mentre compravano la droga.

translation.en: buying drugs.
translation.it: mentre compravano la droga.

translation.en: And, much as I hate to say it...
translation.it: E anche se detesto dirlo...

translation.en: I heard about it and read it in the paper and...
translation.it: L'avevo sentito dire e l'avevo letto sul giornale...

translation.en: my attitude at that time, and I'm not proud of it, okay, was...
translation.it: ...e il mio atteggiamento, e non ne vado fiero, era stato:

translation.en: "Kids shouldn't have been up there."
translation.it: "Non dovevano andarci".

translation.en: [Annie] And now we're going into the Schneider house.
translation.it: E ora entriamo a casa Schneider.

translation.en: Let's see what's going on in here on Christmas Day.
translation.it: Vediamo cosa succede qui, a Natale.

translation.en: What you got, Danny?
translation.it: Cos'hai ricevuto, Danny?

translation.en: [Dan] Danny had some difficulty, his senior year.
translation.it: Danny ha avuto delle difficoltà, all'ultimo anno.

translation.en: He barely graduated.
translation.it: Si è diplomato a stento.

translation.en: Some people could say these were warning signs,
translation.it: Si potrebbe dire che fosse un segnale d'allarme,

translation.en: but, at the time, we really couldn't see it.
translation.it: ma allora non lo capimmo.

translation.en: He went to Nunez Community College.
translation.it: È andato al Nunez Community College.

translation.en: And even though he was 22 years of age, he was still living with us.
translation.it: E, anche se aveva 22 anni, viveva ancora con noi.

translation.en: He worked at Pizza Hut at night.
translation.it: Lavorava da Pizza Hut, la sera.

translation.en: He had purchased a brand-new Ford Ranger pickup truck.
translation.it: Aveva comprato un furgone Ford Ranger nuovo di zecca.

translation.en: And, uh, he was really excited about that.
translation.it: Ed era davvero entusiasta.

translation.en: [Annie] His girlfriend had a scholarship
translation.it: La sua ragazza aveva una borsa di studio per l'Università del Mississippi

translation.en: to the University of Mississippi, so he would drive
translation.it: La sua ragazza aveva una borsa di studio per l'Università del Mississippi e lui andava e veniva da Hattiesburg ogni weekend

translation.en: back and forth to Hattiesburg every weekend
translation.it: e lui andava e veniva da Hattiesburg ogni weekend

translation.en: to see his girlfriend, which was a long way.
translation.it: per vederla, ed era un viaggio lungo.

translation.en: [Kristi] I think Danny was just struggling with what to do with himself.
translation.it: Credo che Danny stesse cercando di capire cosa fare.

translation.en: [automated voice] Wednesday, 2:45 a.m.
translation.it: Mercoledì, 2:45 del mattino.

translation.en: [Danny] Hey, baby, um...
translation.it: Ciao, tesoro...

translation.en: Just calling to say I love you.
translation.it: Ti chiamo per dirti che ti amo.

translation.en: Um... I can't wait to talk to you...
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di parlare con te...

translation.en: tonight.
translation.it: ...stasera.

translation.en: I'll talk to you later. I hope you're having a good day.
translation.it: A dopo. Ti auguro una bella giornata.

translation.en: I love you. Bye.
translation.it: Ti amo. Ciao.

translation.en: [Kristi] Well, I was just downstairs on the computer, doing my own thing and...
translation.it: Ero al piano di sotto, al computer, a fare le mie cose, e...

translation.en: Danny came down the stairs and talked to my parents and said he was leaving the house.
translation.it: ...Danny è sceso e ha detto ai miei che stava uscendo.

translation.en: [Dan] "I'm going to a friend's house tonight
translation.it: "Stasera vado da un amico

translation.en: to study for a test that I have tomorrow in school."
translation.it: a studiare per un compito che ho domani a scuola."

translation.en: [Annie] "Okay, don't be too late. You've got school tomorrow."
translation.it: "Non fare troppo tardi, domani hai lezione."

translation.en: You know, so he said, "I won't."
translation.it: E lui: "Va bene".

translation.en: He said, "Love y'all," and he left. He said, "I'll be back soon."
translation.it: Ha detto: "Vi voglio bene, torno presto", ed è uscito.

translation.en: [Kristi] I heard him go out the back door and leave,
translation.it: L'ho sentito uscire dal retro e...

translation.en: and that was it.
translation.it: ...andar via, ed è tutto.

translation.en: [Shane] I'm not sure. I think it was around 12 o'clock that night.
translation.it: Non lo so. Credo fosse circa mezzanotte.

translation.en: I was standing in front of my mom's house.
translation.it: Ero davanti a casa di mia madre.

translation.en: And as the red truck passed us, I could see it was a white guy.
translation.it: E quando il furgone rosso passò, vidi che era un ragazzo bianco.

translation.en: My friend, he said...
translation.it: Il mio amico disse:

translation.en: "Who that is? 'Cause he was looking at you."
translation.it: "Chi è quello? Perché ti guardava".

translation.en: I said, "I don't know who that is."
translation.it: Ho detto: "Non so chi sia".

translation.en: At two o'clock in the morning, we got a loud knock on the door.
translation.it: Alle due del mattino bussarono forte alla porta.

translation.en: [Annie] I woke Danny up and said,
translation.it: Ho svegliato Danny e gli ho detto: "Bussano alla porta.

translation.en: "Somebody's knocking at our door. It's two o'clock in the morning.
translation.it: Ho svegliato Danny e gli ho detto: "Bussano alla porta. Sono le due del mattino. Chi può essere?"

translation.en: Who can that be?" You know?
translation.it: Sono le due del mattino. Chi può essere?"

translation.en: [Dan] There were two policemen at the front door and they came in
translation.it: C'erano due poliziotti all'ingresso,

translation.en: and said, "We'd like to come in and discuss something with you."
translation.it: entrarono e dissero: "Vorremmo entrare e parlarvi di qualcosa".

translation.en: [Annie] They said they found our son in the 9th Ward in New Orleans.
translation.it: Dissero di aver trovato nostro figlio nel 9th Ward a New Orleans.

translation.en: I said, "No, my son's upstairs sleeping. I don't know what you're talking about."
translation.it: "No, mio figlio è di sopra che dorme. Non so di cosa parlate."

translation.en: [Kristi] I just ran to his room...
translation.it: Sono corsa in camera sua...

translation.en: to see if he was sleeping.
translation.it: ...per vedere se stava dormendo.

translation.en: I said, "Okay, well, we'll go get dressed. I guess we'll get dressed."
translation.it: Dissi: "Ok, beh, andiamo a vestirci. Penso che ci vestiremo".

translation.en: We got into the sheriff's car.
translation.it: Siamo saliti sull'auto dello sceriffo.

translation.en: We're going, "Where did y'all say his truck was at?"
translation.it: Abbiamo chiesto: "Dov'era il furgone?"

translation.en: And, "It's in the 9th Ward."
translation.it: "È nel 9th Ward."

translation.en: We said, "We want to pass where you said his truck was at
translation.it: E noi: "Vogliamo vedere dove si trovava il furgone,

translation.en: before you go any further."
translation.it: prima che continuiate".

translation.en: [Jeffery] Sitting there, watching that scene of the cops around a red truck...
translation.it: Stare lì seduto a guardare la polizia intorno al furgone rosso...

translation.en: -and me knowing... -[radio chatter continues]
translation.it: ...mentre sapevo...

translation.en: what just took place...
translation.it: ...cos'era successo...

translation.en: It was unbelievable to me.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a crederci.

translation.en: But it was believable because it's right in my face.
translation.it: Ma dovevo crederci perché era davanti ai miei occhi.

translation.en: [Shane] When you're from the Lower 9th Ward...
translation.it: Se sei del Lower 9th Ward...

translation.en: you don't snitch. You don't snitch.
translation.it: ...non fai la spia.

translation.en: [Dan] Police department drove past the scene
translation.it: La polizia guidò oltre la scena

translation.en: and this all started hitting me in the face that there was a drug deal.
translation.it: e iniziai a capire che era una faccenda di spaccio.

translation.en: He was buying crack in the 9th Ward. I couldn't believe it.
translation.it: Stava comprando crack nel 9th Ward. Incredibile.

translation.en: They said... "Your son was shot."
translation.it: Dissero: "Hanno sparato a vostro figlio".

translation.en: And I said, "What hospital is he in?" [stammers] And then they had to reiterate, "No, no, he's dead."
translation.it: Chiesi: "In che ospedale è?" E loro hanno ribadito: "No, è morto".

translation.en: [sniffles] So...
translation.it: Quindi...

translation.en: [Debbie] I went over there and Annie opened the front door of the house.
translation.it: Andai da loro e Annie aprì la porta di casa.

translation.en: And she fell on the floor.
translation.it: E cadde a terra.

translation.en: They were...
translation.it: Erano...

translation.en: beyond...
translation.it: ...del tutto...

translation.en: Beyond help.
translation.it: ...devastati.

translation.en: [Dan] The day after, me and my wife stayed in bed all day.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, io e mia moglie restammo a letto tutto il giorno.

translation.en: We thought about committing suicide...
translation.it: Pensammo di suicidarci.

translation.en: as a family.
translation.it: Come famiglia.

translation.en: We actually thought about it.
translation.it: Ci abbiamo pensato.

translation.en: 'Cause we just couldn't see a future.
translation.it: Perché non vedevamo un futuro.

translation.en: [Annie sobbing] Why did he have to take him so soon?
translation.it: Ma perché Lui ha dovuto prenderselo così presto?

translation.en: Why did he have to take him so soon?
translation.it: Perché così presto?

translation.en: He could have waited. [cries, gasps]
translation.it: Avrebbe potuto aspettare.

translation.en: [Dan] I can't answer that, baby.
translation.it: Non so rispondere, tesoro.

translation.en: I don't think he just took him. I think it just happened, Annie.
translation.it: Non credo che l'abbia preso. Credo sia capitato, Annie.

translation.en: Things sometimes just happen, Annie.
translation.it: A volte le cose capitano, Annie.

translation.en: People in the wrong place at the wrong time. [Annie] ...he got a motorcycle...
translation.it: Ci si trova nel posto sbagliato al momento sbagliato.

translation.en: [Dan] It might have made him a special angel, it may have given him a place in heaven.
translation.it: Forse l'ha reso un angelo speciale, forse gli ha dato un posto in paradiso.

translation.en: All you can think is that he's in heaven.
translation.it: Devi pensare che è in paradiso.

translation.en: -[cheering] -And that we're gonna be there with him...
translation.it: E che saremo lì con lui...

translation.en: someday.
translation.it: ...un giorno.

translation.en: I could have just been a little bit more lenient with Danny a little earlier.
translation.it: Avrei potuto essere più tollerante con Danny, prima.

translation.en: I mean, if I could've just sat down with him
translation.it: Cioè, avrei potuto sedermi con lui

translation.en: and said, "Danny, you can tell me anything."
translation.it: e dirgli: "Danny, puoi dirmi tutto".

translation.en: [Annie] I should have been there for him.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto esserci per lui.

translation.en: [Dan] Baby, we were here for him. He could have came here this last night.
translation.it: Tesoro, noi c'eravamo. Avrebbe potuto venire qui ieri sera.

translation.en: He could have came in this room that last night
translation.it: Poteva entrare in questa stanza

translation.en: and said, "Mom and Daddy, I'm in trouble.
translation.it: e dire: "Mamma e papà, sono nei guai.

translation.en: I feel like I've got to go up there and buy dope. Okay?
translation.it: Sento di dover andare lassù a comprare roba. Ok?

translation.en: [stammers] And I don't want to, Daddy. Help me, Daddy."
translation.it: E non voglio, papà. Aiutami, papà".

translation.en: [Annie] Why couldn't he tell us he was doing that?
translation.it: Perché non ci ha detto cosa faceva?

translation.en: So we could help him.
translation.it: Lo avremmo aiutato.

translation.en: [Dan] He was proud. He was too proud, baby.
translation.it: Era troppo orgoglioso, tesoro.

translation.en: He was too proud to admit that he... ...was getting addicted.
translation.it: Troppo orgoglioso per ammettere che stava diventando tossicodipendente.

translation.en: -That stuff gets hold of you. -[Annie] I should have watched him closer.
translation.it: - Quella roba ti prende. - Avrei dovuto controllarlo.

translation.en: -I shouldn't have let him do that. -[Dan] Baby, baby, it wasn't your fault.
translation.it: - Non avrei dovuto permetterglielo. - Tesoro, non è colpa tua.

translation.en: [Debbie] Dan told me that he didn't even think...
translation.it: Dan mi ha detto che non aveva pensato...

translation.en: that anybody killed Danny. That was the furthest thing from his mind.
translation.it: ...che Danny fosse stato ucciso. Era l'ultimo dei suoi pensieri.

translation.en: He knew Danny was shot, but he just couldn't even think...
translation.it: Sapeva che gli avevano sparato, ma non riusciva a pensare...

translation.en: that there was a crime.
translation.it: ...che fosse un delitto.

translation.en: [Dan] One day it hit me, my son had been murdered.
translation.it: Lo capii di colpo, mio figlio era stato ucciso.

translation.en: I started moving into the investigation phase, you might say, you know, we...
translation.it: Ho iniziato a passare alla fase investigativa, si potrebbe dire.

translation.en: There was a killer out there and we wanted to find his killer.
translation.it: C'era un assassino e lo volevamo trovare.

translation.en: Around the time of Danny's death,
translation.it: All'epoca della morte di Danny,

translation.en: New Orleans had a reputation of "the murder capital of America."
translation.it: New Orleans aveva la nomea di capitale americana degli omicidi.

translation.en: And almost none of 'em got solved.
translation.it: E quasi nessuno è stato risolto.

translation.en: [reporter] New Orleans will set a record for homicides this year.
translation.it: New Orleans quest'anno segnerà il record di omicidi.

translation.en: It has, by far, the highest murder rate of any big city in the nation.
translation.it: Ha di gran lunga il più alto tasso di omicidi tra le grandi città del Paese.

translation.en: The reasons most often cited for the increase: kids, guns and drugs.
translation.it: I motivi più citati per l'aumento: ragazzi, armi e droghe.

translation.en: [man] At the time, the New Orleans Police Department
translation.it: Allora, il dipartimento di New Orleans

translation.en: were the poster children for how not to run a police agency.
translation.it: era l'esempio di come non gestire una centrale di polizia.

translation.en: [reporter 2] In the past three years, more than 100 police officers
translation.it: Negli ultimi tre anni, oltre 100 agenti di polizia

translation.en: have been suspended, fired, arrested
translation.it: sono stati sospesi, licenziati, arrestati

translation.en: or convicted of a wide variety of serious crimes,
translation.it: o condannati per reati gravi di vario tipo,

translation.en: ranging from bribery to murder.
translation.it: dalla corruzione all'omicidio.

translation.en: [Jack] If you're a guy in that situation,
translation.it: Per un uomo in quella situazione,

translation.en: it's hard to have a high degree of confidence in the police.
translation.it: è difficile avere molta fiducia nella polizia.

translation.en: -[man on tape] Investigations. -[Dan] Hi, yes, is this Sergeant Fanguy?
translation.it: - Indagini. - Salve, è il sergente Fanguy?

translation.en: -[Fanguy] Yes, it is. -How are you doing? This is Dan Schneider.
translation.it: - Sì. - Come va? Sono Dan Schneider.

translation.en: [Dan] I knew I was gonna have an uphill battle with the police.
translation.it: Sapevo che sarebbe stata dura, con la polizia.

translation.en: They kind of almost have the attitude that these kind of kids maybe got what they deserved.
translation.it: Si comportano quasi come se i ragazzi se la fossero cercata.

translation.en: [Fanguy on tape] Once out of every 200 dope deals,
translation.it: Su 200 compravendite di droga,

translation.en: somebody gets stupid and then somebody gets shot.
translation.it: uno fa lo stupido e poi gli sparano.

translation.en: [Dan] I know, but let me just tell you, my boy was not stupid.
translation.it: Lo so, ma mio figlio non era stupido.

translation.en: [Fanguy] I'm telling you, he did not give the money to the guy,
translation.it: Le sto dicendo che non ha pagato il tizio,

translation.en: and the guy upped with the pistol and popped him.
translation.it: e il tizio gli ha sparato.

translation.en: -Okay? And-- -[Dan] So you think he tried--
translation.it: Avrebbe cercato...

translation.en: [Fanguy] And I can tell you that, with all the murders we've handled,
translation.it: E con tutti gli omicidi che abbiamo seguito, posso dirle,

translation.en: the white kids coming from St. Bernard Parish,
translation.it: sui ragazzi bianchi di St. Bernard Parish,

translation.en: that's the exact parameters of what takes place and that's the outcome.
translation.it: che succede esattamente questo e che quello è il risultato.

translation.en: [Dan] But why would my son beat 'em for the dope?
translation.it: Ma perché mio figlio non avrebbe pagato?

translation.en: My son don't wanna die. My son is not stupid.
translation.it: Non voleva morire. Non era stupido.

translation.en: [Fanguy] Guess what?
translation.it: Indovini.

translation.en: None of those other people who got shot and killed wanted to die either.
translation.it: Nemmeno le altre persone uccise volevano morire.

translation.en: [Dan] A sergeant lit into me. He said, "Your son's a spoiled brat.
translation.it: Un sergente mi ha rimproverato: "Suo figlio è un moccioso viziato.

translation.en: He's nothing but a crackhead.
translation.it: È solo un drogato.

translation.en: If you go above me or below me, I'll make sure your son's case is destroyed."
translation.it: Se lei cerca di scavalcarmi, mi accerterò che il caso di suo figlio sia distrutto".

translation.en: I was shocked
translation.it: Ero scioccato che potesse parlarmi così.

translation.en: that he could talk to me like that, okay?
translation.it: Ero scioccato che potesse parlarmi così. Avevamo appena persono nostro figlio.

translation.en: After we'd just lost our son.
translation.it: Avevamo appena persono nostro figlio.

translation.en: It was from that point on that I started recording these guys.
translation.it: Da lì in poi, ho iniziato a registrarli.

translation.en: [officer 1 on tape] What are you doing calling my house at seven in the morning?
translation.it: Perché chiama a casa mia alle sette del mattino?

translation.en: [officer 2] We're not gonna jerk people off the street and pull them into the station
translation.it: Non prenderemo la gente per strada per portarla in centrale

translation.en: -because somebody wants it done. -[Fanguy] You think you're the police.
translation.it: perché qualcuno lo vuole. Pensa di essere la polizia. Pensa di avere tutte le teorie.

translation.en: You think you have all the theories, okay?
translation.it: Pensa di essere la polizia. Pensa di avere tutte le teorie.

translation.en: I'm not gonna sit here and go through this.
translation.it: Non me ne starò a farmi insultare.

translation.en: I've been a policeman for 25 years.
translation.it: Sono un poliziotto da 25 anni.

translation.en: [Dan] My son had been murdered.
translation.it: Mio figlio era stato ucciso.

translation.en: Somebody out there took his life.
translation.it: Qualcuno l'aveva ucciso.

translation.en: I was determined to get the killer off the street
translation.it: Ero determinato a prendere l'assassino,

translation.en: and, if the police wasn't gonna do it, I was gonna do it.
translation.it: e se la polizia non lo faceva, lo avrei fatto io.

translation.en: While some people are paralyzed by grief
translation.it: Mentre alcune persone sono paralizzate dal dolore,

translation.en: and don't know what to do and can't get out of bed
translation.it: non sanno cosa fare e non possono alzarsi dal letto

translation.en: and turn to alcohol or drugs or whatever,
translation.it: e si danno all'alcol, alla droga o ad altro,

translation.en: Dan didn't do that.
translation.it: Dan no.

translation.en: Dan channeled all of that grief into, "I'm gonna get to the bottom of this.
translation.it: Dan ha incanalato tutto il lutto e ha detto: "Andrò fino in fondo.

translation.en: I'm gonna find out who killed my son."
translation.it: Scoprirò chi ha ucciso mio figlio".

translation.en: The first thing that we did, -we called the TV stations in, -[stapling] so we could get publicity.
translation.it: Abbiamo chiamato le emittenti televisive per renderci visibili.

translation.en: [reporter] The St. Bernard family is on a campaign for justice.
translation.it: La famiglia di St. Bernard sta facendo una campagna per la giustizia.

translation.en: [Dan] We made a little memorial up there. We said a prayer.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto un piccolo altare. Abbiamo pregato.

translation.en: [together] Our Father who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name.
translation.it: Padre nostro, che sei nei cieli, sia santificato il tuo nome.

translation.en: [Dan] All we did was cry all morning.
translation.it: Abbiamo pianto tutta la mattina.

translation.en: You just get sick with crying and then you just feel like you have to do something.
translation.it: Stai male a furia di piangere e poi pensi di dover fare qualcosa.

translation.en: [Dan] Putting up posters, walking the streets, questioning people.
translation.it: Mettere manifesti, camminare per strada, interrogare la gente.

translation.en: [reporter 2] They hope that someone may recognize Schneider's picture
translation.it: Sperano che qualcuno riconosca la foto di Schneider

translation.en: and provide a clue to his killer.
translation.it: e fornisca un indizio sull'assassino.

translation.en: [Jack] He started talking to people and, in fact, canvassing the neighborhood.
translation.it: Iniziò a parlare con la gente e a setacciare il quartiere.

translation.en: At which point in time, I told him that...
translation.it: A quel punto, gli dissi che...

translation.en: that was probably a really, really bad thing to do.
translation.it: ...probabilmente era una pessima idea.

translation.en: That he was gonna be the next victim of a gunshot wound in the Lower 9th Ward.
translation.it: Che sarebbe stato la prossima vittima di un'arma nel Lower 9th Ward.

translation.en: [Shane] I seen them walking along the block.
translation.it: Li ho visti camminare lungo l'isolato.

translation.en: I knew they didn't belong in the neighborhood
translation.it: Sapevo che non appartenevano al quartiere,

translation.en: because if it wasn't an insurance man or the bill collector...
translation.it: perché se non erano assicuratori o esattori...

translation.en: they didn't belong there.
translation.it: ...non era il posto per loro.

translation.en: I wouldn't have the balls to go door-to-door on the Lower 9th Ward with a gun on me.
translation.it: Non avrei le palle di bussare a ogni porta nemmeno se mi puntassero una pistola.

translation.en: We had officers shadow him.
translation.it: Degli agenti lo pedinavano.

translation.en: [Jeffery] It was just like, "He's got to be crazy.
translation.it: Pensavamo: "Dev'essere pazzo.

translation.en: What's wrong with him, coming in here, doing all this here?"
translation.it: Non sta bene, che viene qui a fare tutto questo?"

translation.en: He was that bold.
translation.it: Era così coraggioso.

translation.en: He was that bold. He wanted-- He wanted answers.
translation.it: Era così coraggioso. Voleva delle risposte.

translation.en: [Dan] We went and met with some of the churches. And they prayed with us.
translation.it: Siamo andati in alcune chiese. E hanno pregato con noi.

translation.en: [Terrence] I remember Dan and his wife coming to our family meeting...
translation.it: Mi ricordo Dan e sua moglie alla riunione della nostra famiglia.

translation.en: and, um, speaking about the loss of their son.
translation.it: Hanno parlato della perdita del figlio.

translation.en: I just remember that he was very hurt.
translation.it: Ricordo solo che era molto ferito.

translation.en: I call it a "question mark" pain.
translation.it: Io lo chiamo dolore da punto interrogativo.

translation.en: "I can't live with this question mark."
translation.it: "Non posso vivere con questo punto interrogativo."

translation.en: [Dan] Elder Reed said, "You know, Mr. Schneider, we'll walk the streets with you.
translation.it: L'anziano Reed disse: "Sig. Schneider, verremo per strada con lei.

translation.en: We will go house-to-house,
translation.it: Andremo di casa in casa.

translation.en: and we'll let you ask the questions and we'll be there with you
translation.it: Lei farà le domande e noi saremo lì con lei

translation.en: as moral support and protection."
translation.it: come supporto morale e protezione".

translation.en: I just said, "I'll help you."
translation.it: Dissi solo: "L'aiuterò".

translation.en: 'Cause I felt his pain.
translation.it: Perché ho sentito il suo dolore.

translation.en: He was in a lot of pain and he was angry.
translation.it: Soffriva molto, era arrabbiato.

translation.en: And I thought that was a good recipe to get yourself killed in this neighborhood.
translation.it: Era la ricetta perfetta per farsi uccidere, in questo quartiere.

translation.en: [spokesman] Sad to say, but we haven't really been able
translation.it: È triste dirlo, ma non siamo riusciti a trovare nessuno

translation.en: to locate anyone who's been willing to come forward
translation.it: È triste dirlo, ma non siamo riusciti a trovare nessuno disposto a farsi avanti che abbia visto l'accaduto

translation.en: who may have witnessed the incident
translation.it: disposto a farsi avanti che abbia visto l'accaduto

translation.en: or who may have any information regarding the incident.
translation.it: o che possa avere informazioni.

translation.en: [Debbie] So many unsolved murders in New Orleans.
translation.it: Quanti omicidi irrisolti a New Orleans...

translation.en: Because nobody was coming forward.
translation.it: Perché nessuno si faceva avanti.

translation.en: What do you do? What do you do?
translation.it: Cosa fai?

translation.en: -[Dan] How are you doing? -Good, Danny.
translation.it: Come stai? Bene, Danny.

translation.en: [Dan] Debbie Marino, good, good friend of ours.
translation.it: Debbie Marino, una nostra grande amica.

translation.en: She handed me a check for, like, $2,000.
translation.it: Mi ha dato un assegno da 2000 dollari.

translation.en: And other people, family members and friends, put in money.
translation.it: E altre persone, familiari e amici, hanno dato dei soldi.

translation.en: -The reward fund is up to $10,000. -Ten thousand dollars.
translation.it: Il fondo per la ricompensa è arrivato a $10.000.

translation.en: Ten thousand dollars on the table. [reporter 1] Call Crimestoppers at 822-1111.
translation.it: - $10.000 sul tavolo. - Chiamate Crimestoppers all'822-1111.

translation.en: [Dan] It was explained to me that the person would be anonymous
translation.it: Mi è stato spiegato che la persona sarebbe rimasta anonima

translation.en: and that only upon indictment would they actually receive their reward.
translation.it: e che solo dopo l'incriminazione avrebbe ricevuto la sua ricompensa.

translation.en: [reporter 1] And a reminder, you do not have to give your name.
translation.it: E ricordate, non dovete dare il vostro nome.

translation.en: That's one big concern with the family.
translation.it: Per la famiglia è importante.

translation.en: They feel anybody in the neighborhood who may know something
translation.it: Pensano che chiunque possa sapere qualcosa

translation.en: is afraid to come forward and tell what they know.
translation.it: abbia paura di farsi avanti e parlare.

translation.en: When the reward was just at $1,000,
translation.it: Quando la ricompensa era a 1000 dollari,

translation.en: it was just like, "Yeah, okay, that's another murder happened, you know, that ain't gonna get solved."
translation.it: era solo un altro omicidio che non sarebbe stato risolto.

translation.en: Well, when $10,000 came up,
translation.it: Ma quando arrivò a 10.000 dollari,

translation.en: they had people pulling them flyers down
translation.it: c'erano persone che strappavano i volantini

translation.en: wanting to talk.
translation.it: per parlare.

translation.en: [Fanguy] Yes? Sergeant Fanguy.
translation.it: Sì? Sergente Fanguy.

translation.en: [Dan] Thank you, Sergeant. What you got?
translation.it: Grazie, Sergente. Cos'ha trovato?

translation.en: [Fanguy] Uh... wanted to let you know that we found out who the shooter was on your son's case.
translation.it: Volevo dirle che abbiamo scoperto chi ha sparato a suo figlio.

translation.en: Do we have any witnesses?
translation.it: Abbiamo dei testimoni?

translation.en: [Fanguy] We do have an eyewitness.
translation.it: Un testimone oculare.

translation.en: [Fanguy] The kid has picked his picture out. We're getting ready to take a statement from him.
translation.it: Il ragazzo ha indicato la sua foto. Stiamo per prenderne la dichiarazione.

translation.en: Uh, he corroborates a lot of things based on evidence at the scene.
translation.it: Conferma molte cose sulla base delle prove sulla scena.

translation.en: [Dan] And they went out to a young man named Jeffery Hall.
translation.it: E andarono da un giovane di nome Jeffery Hall.

translation.en: He was about 15 years of age.
translation.it: Aveva circa 15 anni.

translation.en: Apparently, Jeffery saw it all.
translation.it: A quanto pare, Jeffery ha visto tutto.

translation.en: [Jeffery] They were questioning me about it, you know, and, um...
translation.it: Mi stavano interrogando e...

translation.en: I gave them...
translation.it: ...ho detto loro,

translation.en: to the best of my ability, what I could remember.
translation.it: facendo del mio meglio, ciò che ricordavo.

translation.en: [Fanguy on tape] This juvenile, that's the witness... -[Dan] Yeah. -...sold drugs to your son before.
translation.it: Questo minore, il testimone, aveva già venduto droga a suo figlio.

translation.en: -[Dan] Wow. -[Fanguy] He knew your son.
translation.it: Conosceva suo figlio.

translation.en: He was walking towards your son when he saw him pulling up,
translation.it: Si è avviato verso suo figlio, quando ha accostato,

translation.en: but the other boy was standing there first and he approached your son.
translation.it: ma l'altro ragazzo era già lì ed è andato da suo figlio.

translation.en: [Dan] Oh, so somebody beat him to it. [Fanguy] Right.
translation.it: - Qualcuno l'ha preceduto. - Esatto.

translation.en: [Dan] So this guy probably wouldn't have blown my son away.
translation.it: Lui non avrebbe sparato a mio figlio.

translation.en: -He would probably have dealt with my son. -[Fanguy] Right. Right.
translation.it: - Avrebbe contrattato con mio figlio. - Giusto.

translation.en: And, according to the witness, the guy upped with the pistol -and shot him. -[Dan] Okay.
translation.it: E, secondo il testimone, il tizio gli ha sparato.

translation.en: [Fanguy] So, he just picked the suspect's picture out of a lineup.
translation.it: Quindi ha scelto la foto del sospettato in mezzo ad altre.

translation.en: [Dan] And the suspect was a guy named Scarface.
translation.it: E il sospettato era un tale di nome Scarface.

translation.en: [Jeffery] Scarface was a person in the neighborhood who was known for doing bad things.
translation.it: Scarface era uno del quartiere noto per le sue malefatte.

translation.en: Jacking, killing, robbing. Just...
translation.it: Furti, omicidi, rapine...

translation.en: Anything bad, Scarface did it.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa brutta, Scarface l'ha fatta.

translation.en: [Fanguy] The way he describes how the shooting took place, he'd have had to been there to see it go down.
translation.it: Da come ha descritto la sparatoria, doveva per forza essere presente.

translation.en: I'm gonna have the warrant put in the computer immediately.
translation.it: Inserirò subito il mandato nel computer.

translation.en: He could be arrested in the next 30 minutes.
translation.it: Potremmo arrestarlo entro 30 minuti.

translation.en: [Dan] Oh, boy.
translation.it: Oh, cielo.

translation.en: You've taken about a thousand pounds off my back, I think.
translation.it: Mi ha tolto un peso enorme di dosso.

translation.en: [Dan] Well, the next morning, the lieutenant called me and said...
translation.it: Il mattino dopo, il tenente mi chiamò e disse:

translation.en: "Mr. Schneider, I'm sorry to say this, but, uh...
translation.it: "Signor Schneider, mi dispiace dirlo, ma...

translation.en: your son's murder isn't solved.
translation.it: ...l'omicidio di suo figlio non è risolto.

translation.en: We went out to arrest that killer, but we found out that killer was in jail and he had been in jail the night your son was murdered...
translation.it: Chi stavamo per arrestare è in carcere e lo era anche la notte dell'omicidio".

translation.en: so he couldn't have been the killer."
translation.it: Quindi non poteva essere lui.

translation.en: The DA told me the case was pretty weak.
translation.it: Il procuratore mi disse che il caso era debole.

translation.en: Because of all the confusion,
translation.it: A causa della confusione,

translation.en: it was gonna be hard to actually charge the case.
translation.it: sarebbe stato difficile istruire il caso.

translation.en: [Fanguy] I mean, he has made contradictory statements, as I told you.
translation.it: Ha fatto dichiarazioni contraddittorie, come le ho detto.

translation.en: [Dan] He's really lost a lot of his credibility.
translation.it: Ha perso molta della sua credibilità.

translation.en: I didn't actually, you know, know the guy.
translation.it: Non conoscevo davvero il tipo.

translation.en: I knew him, but I couldn't point him out.
translation.it: Lo conoscevo, ma non sapevo indicarlo.

translation.en: [Dan] You said that you were gonna recommend that the case, at this time, be, uh...
translation.it: Ha detto che avrebbe suggerito che il caso venisse...

translation.en: -[Fanguy] Refused. -[Dan] Just refused.
translation.it: - Rifiutato. - Sì, rifiutato.

translation.en: [Fanguy] That the testimony is insufficient to prove this crime.
translation.it: Che la testimonianza non basta a provare questo crimine.

translation.en: [Dan] I didn't trust the cops or the DA.
translation.it: Non mi fidavo della polizia e del procuratore.

translation.en: I thought that if we could get the DA to re-interview this witness,
translation.it: Pensavo che se il procuratore avesse reinterrogato il testimone,

translation.en: maybe we could get the story straight and have a case.
translation.it: forse potevamo venirne a capo e avere un caso.

translation.en: I said, "I'd like to bring the witness back in.
translation.it: Dissi: "Mi piacerebbe richiamare il testimone.

translation.en: Can you give me his address?"
translation.it: Mi dà il suo indirizzo?"

translation.en: I started reflecting on where he grew up.
translation.it: Ho iniziato a riflettere su dove era cresciuto.

translation.en: And I found out that the conditions he came up in had been really bad.
translation.it: E scoprii che le condizioni in cui era cresciuto erano pessime.

translation.en: It was a struggle every day, man.
translation.it: Era una lotta ogni giorno.

translation.en: You know, Mom had a problem...
translation.it: Mamma aveva un problema...

translation.en: you know, that I didn't understand.
translation.it: ...che non capivo.

translation.en: Seeing my mom on drugs was real painful for me.
translation.it: Vedere mia madre strafatta era molto doloroso per me.

translation.en: One time, I was 11 years old...
translation.it: Una volta, avevo 11 anni...

translation.en: I took her drugs and her paraphernalia and I took it and threw it away
translation.it: ...le ho preso la droga e l'armamentario, l'ho presa e l'ho buttata

translation.en: and told her she was gonna get off this stuff.
translation.it: e le ho detto che doveva smettere.

translation.en: And she taught me a lesson.
translation.it: E mi ha dato una lezione.

translation.en: Turned on the stove.
translation.it: Accese il fornello.

translation.en: She called some people and held me off and held my arm, held my two legs and...
translation.it: Chiamò delle persone e mi bloccò il braccio e le gambe...

translation.en: she took my hand and put it on the fire, like this.
translation.it: ...mi prese la mano e la mise sul fuoco, così.

translation.en: And that's what really led me to being affiliated in the streets.
translation.it: Ed è questo che mi ha portato sulla strada.

translation.en: Being the age that I was and in that situation I was in...
translation.it: All'età che avevo e nella situazione in cui ero...

translation.en: it was a constant challenge and struggle for me.
translation.it: ...era una sfida e una lotta continua per me.

translation.en: I was scared more than anything.
translation.it: Avevo più paura che altro.

translation.en: [Annie] Danny was hoping that this young man
translation.it: Danny sperava che questo giovanotto

translation.en: could actually help us find the killer of our son
translation.it: potesse aiutarci a trovare l'assassino di nostro figlio

translation.en: and he believed in him.
translation.it: e credeva in lui.

translation.en: [Dan] It's, uh... I think it's July 28th.
translation.it: REGISTRAZIONE DEL 28 LUGLIO 1999 Credo sia il 28 luglio.

translation.en: I, uh...
translation.it: Io...

translation.en: need some help today. Today's an important day
translation.it: Oggi ho bisogno di aiuto. È un giorno importante

translation.en: [strained] in my fight to get Danny some justice.
translation.it: nella mia lotta per avere giustizia per Danny.

translation.en: Today's the day, God, that Jeffery Hall, who is the witness... [sniffles]
translation.it: Oggi è il giorno, Dio, in cui Jeffery Hall, che è il testimone...

translation.en: The DA's gonna interview him.
translation.it: Il procuratore lo interrogherà.

translation.en: [sniffles] I've had a couple conversations with the kid.
translation.it: Ho parlato un paio di volte con il ragazzo.

translation.en: He's scared to death. He's scared of the police.
translation.it: È terrorizzato. Ha paura della polizia.

translation.en: The people on the street. He's afraid he might have to appear in court.
translation.it: Della gente della strada. Teme di dover andare in tribunale.

translation.en: [crying] I need God to get inside him and get the whole truth. God...
translation.it: Ho bisogno che Dio entri in lui per avere tutta la verità. Dio...

translation.en: help him get in the car with me today.
translation.it: ...aiutalo a salire in auto con me, oggi.

translation.en: [sniffles] I need him in court, God. I need the boy to be brave.
translation.it: Mi serve in tribunale, Dio. Ho bisogno che sia coraggioso.

translation.en: And I need you to protect him. [sniffles]
translation.it: E ho bisogno che tu lo protegga.

translation.en: Please. I know you can't give me my boy back...
translation.it: Ti prego. So che non puoi ridarmi mio figlio...

translation.en: on Earth...
translation.it: ...sulla Terra...

translation.en: but you could have an effect on this young man.
translation.it: ...ma potresti agire su questo giovanotto.

translation.en: He was on my front step seeking answers, wanting answers.
translation.it: Era davanti a me, cercava risposte, voleva risposte.

translation.en: [Dan] I was already recording a lot of people, so I felt like -that was a great opportunity. -[tape clicks]
translation.it: Stavo già registrando molta gente, e pensai che fosse una grande occasione.

translation.en: And I wired my car...
translation.it: E ho collegato la mia auto...

translation.en: with a recording device...
translation.it: ...a un registratore...

translation.en: and put it in the trunk of the car with a wire that went to the back seat.
translation.it: ...che ho messo nel bagagliaio con un cavo sul sedile posteriore.

translation.en: I figured that maybe I could get some revealing information.
translation.it: Ho pensato di poter avere delle informazioni rivelatrici.

translation.en: -[mellow instrumentals] -[clicks]
translation.it: REGISTRAZIONE DEL 28 LUGLIO 1999

translation.en: [Dan] It's the corner here. Jeff, you were riding up here?
translation.it: È questo angolo. Jeff, eri qui in bici?

translation.en: [Jeffery] Danny and them were right here on this block.
translation.it: Danny e loro erano qui in questo isolato.

translation.en: So by the time I got down, Danny made the block...
translation.it: E quando sono arrivato, Danny era andato fin lì.

translation.en: Scarface, you know, was right here.
translation.it: Scarface era proprio qui.

translation.en: [Dan] Scarface, right here?
translation.it: Scarface, proprio qui?

translation.en: Okay, but the first night...
translation.it: Ok, ma la prima sera...

translation.en: This is where I'm confused, because this is what messes up the case.
translation.it: Qui sono confuso, è questo che scompiglia il caso.

translation.en: They showed him some pictures. He finally picked out somebody that first night.
translation.it: Gli hanno mostrato delle foto. Ha indicato qualcuno, la prima sera.

translation.en: -[woman] Mm-hmm. -[Dan] Why did you pick out that guy?
translation.it: Perché hai indicato quel tipo?

translation.en: [Jeffery] I was just lying, you know.
translation.it: Stavo solo mentendo.

translation.en: I just did. I was scared for my life.
translation.it: Tutto qua. Temevo per la mia vita.

translation.en: [Dan] You were scared and you thought that would get you out of it?
translation.it: Eri spaventato e pensavi di uscirne così?

translation.en: That's the damn problem. The DA can't just disregard that first statement.
translation.it: Ma il procuratore non può ignorare la prima dichiarazione.

translation.en: Jeffery, you're gonna have to do your best to let that DA know.
translation.it: Jeffery, devi fare del tuo meglio per farlo sapere al procuratore.

translation.en: You've got to try to come across truthful to him now...
translation.it: Devi cercare di farti credere da lui.

translation.en: so that it means a little more to him.
translation.it: Affinché significhi qualcosa, per lui.

translation.en: You know, in his opinion, you could just be--
translation.it: Secondo lui, potresti semplicemente...

translation.en: -[woman] Telling him anything. -[Dan] You could be saying anything.
translation.it: - Dirgli qualsiasi cosa. - Qualsiasi cosa.

translation.en: You were lying the first time and you were lying the second time.
translation.it: Hai mentito la prima volta e la seconda volta.

translation.en: -[woman] Right. -[Dan] And so...
translation.it: - Giusto. - E così...

translation.en: You just tell the truth.
translation.it: ...devi dire la verità.

translation.en: There ain't no way they're gonna nail you on this. I'll make damn sure. Okay?
translation.it: Non c'è modo che ti inchiodino. Me ne assicuro io. Ok?

translation.en: Alright.
translation.it: Va bene.

translation.en: [Dan] The DA re-interviewed him.
translation.it: Il procuratore lo interrogò di nuovo.

translation.en: And then, the next day, I talk to the DA and he says, "Look,"
translation.it: Il giorno dopo il procuratore mi disse: "Senta.

translation.en: he says, "It didn't get any better.
translation.it: Non è andata meglio.

translation.en: He contradicts himself."
translation.it: Si contraddice.

translation.en: "Jeffery Hall is not a credible witness any longer."
translation.it: Jeffery Hall non è più un testimone credibile".

translation.en: "What do I do from here?"
translation.it: E adesso cosa faccio?

translation.en: I was told, "You've got to find another witness.
translation.it: Mi dissero di trovare un altro testimone.

translation.en: You're not gonna get a prosecution unless you get a witness."
translation.it: "Senza testimoni non ci saranno accuse."

translation.en: [NOPD officer on tape] It's not a point of going through the motions.
translation.it: LUGLIO 1999 Non facciamo le cose tanto per farle.

translation.en: It's a point of making a good case that you can prosecute.
translation.it: Bisogna fare un buon caso perché possiate procedere.

translation.en: They're not gonna accept this case unless we produce additional witnesses.
translation.it: Non accetteranno il caso se non presentiamo altri testimoni.

translation.en: We need a witness or we need evidence.
translation.it: Ci serve un testimone o ci servono prove.

translation.en: [Dan] I started looking for witnesses.
translation.it: Iniziai a cercare testimoni.

translation.en: I was starting to walk the streets again and put posters up.
translation.it: Ricominciai a percorrere le strade e a mettere dei poster.

translation.en: Some of the drug dealers had put a bounty out on him
translation.it: Alcuni spacciatori avevano messo una taglia su di lui

translation.en: to stop him from coming in that neighborhood.
translation.it: per impedirgli di entrare in quel quartiere.

translation.en: [Kristi] He wasn't sleeping.
translation.it: Non dormiva.

translation.en: He was up constantly, investigating.
translation.it: Era sempre sveglio per indagare.

translation.en: And I didn't want him to go in the 9th Ward and get killed.
translation.it: Non volevo che andasse nel 9th Ward e venisse ucciso.

translation.en: Then I wouldn't have my dad or my brother.
translation.it: Avrei perso mio padre e mio fratello.

translation.en: [Annie] I was scared, you know, all the time.
translation.it: Avevo sempre paura.

translation.en: "You have me to worry about and you have your daughter to worry about, okay?
translation.it: "Hai me e tua figlia a cui pensare.

translation.en: And we're still here, you know?"
translation.it: Noi siamo ancora qui, sai?"

translation.en: [Fanguy] You need to leave the dust settle right where it's at, right now.
translation.it: Smettila subito di sollevare un polverone.

translation.en: [Dan] I'm trying to help, but I'm not trying to get in your business, okay?
translation.it: Cerco di aiutare, ma non voglio interferire con te.

translation.en: He came to my office and put the recorder on my desk and said, "Listen to this."
translation.it: È venuto da me con il registratore e ha detto: "Ascolti".

translation.en: [chuckles] I say, "You crazy fuck." [laughs]
translation.it: Gli dissi: "Sei pazzo.

translation.en: You know, "We're gonna be scraping you off the street out there."
translation.it: Dovremo raccoglierti per strada".

translation.en: [Dan] I didn't really believe in guns, and so I chose to go up there without a gun.
translation.it: Non credevo nelle armi e così scelsi di andare là senza.

translation.en: But one of my friends was so concerned about me that he decided to ride with me.
translation.it: Ma uno dei miei amici era preoccupato per me e decise di accompagnarmi.

translation.en: He says, "We'll go up there
translation.it: "Andremo là e farai il tuo colloquio

translation.en: and you can do your interviewing and you can do your questioning, okay?
translation.it: "Andremo là e farai il tuo colloquio e le tue domande, ok? Io sarò in auto con la pistola."

translation.en: And I'll be in the car with a gun."
translation.it: e le tue domande, ok? Io sarò in auto con la pistola."

translation.en: And we pulled over the car
translation.it: Abbiamo fermato l'auto

translation.en: and right next to us was a guy, he's a retired drug dealer.
translation.it: e accanto a noi c'era un tizio, un ex-spacciatore.

translation.en: He asked me the details, he asked me the names of the suspects,
translation.it: Mi chiese i dettagli e i nomi dei sospettati,

translation.en: you know, what corner it was on and all this.
translation.it: dove era successo e così via.

translation.en: And he says, "Okay."
translation.it: E disse: "Va bene.

translation.en: He says, "I'm pretty sure I can find out which one it is.
translation.it: Sono sicuro di poter scoprire chi è.

translation.en: Okay? And verify that...
translation.it: E verificare che...

translation.en: they killed him.
translation.it: ...lo abbia ucciso.

translation.en: Do you want me to have him killed?"
translation.it: Vuoi che lo faccia uccidere?"

translation.en: I don't know what world I'm in anymore.
translation.it: Non so più in che mondo vivo.

translation.en: I really don't know what world I'm in.
translation.it: Non lo so proprio.

translation.en: [stammers] For a moment...
translation.it: Per un attimo...

translation.en: [sobbing] I actually thought about it.
translation.it: ...ci ho davvero pensato.

translation.en: Crazy.
translation.it: Pazzesco.

translation.en: But I remembered...
translation.it: Ma ho ricordato...

translation.en: [sniffles] I'd promised God that I was gonna do this the right way.
translation.it: Avevo promesso a Dio di farlo nel modo giusto.

translation.en: I was gonna do it right.
translation.it: Lo avrei fatto bene.

translation.en: It's torturing me!
translation.it: Mi sta torturando.

translation.en: [crying] I can't do it forever. It's tearing me up. It's tearing Mom up.
translation.it: Non posso farlo per sempre. Mi distrugge. E distrugge la mamma.

translation.en: I've set sort of a time limit. I don't know if I'm gonna wanna stick with that, but...
translation.it: Ho fissato un limite di tempo. Non so se vorrò rispettarlo, ma...

translation.en: I can't torture myself forever, Danny. [sniffles]
translation.it: ...non posso torturarmi per sempre, Danny.

translation.en: You want to give up, but you can't give up because you're looking for the answer.
translation.it: Vuoi arrenderti, ma non puoi perché stai cercando la risposta.

translation.en: You're looking to solve the case.
translation.it: Vuoi risolvere il caso.

translation.en: Which doesn't help that much, because you still lost your son.
translation.it: Il che non aiuta molto, perché hai comunque perso tuo figlio.

translation.en: [Dan] I asked God...
translation.it: Ho chiesto a Dio...

translation.en: to help me quit.
translation.it: ...di aiutarmi a smettere.

translation.en: I was anticipating quitting.
translation.it: Avevo intenzione di smettere.

translation.en: I said, "If I haven't found anything by the end of September...
translation.it: Dissi: "Se entro la fine di settembre non ho trovato niente,

translation.en: I promise I'll give it up."
translation.it: prometto di smettere".

translation.en: There were a lot of things I wanted to do during the course of this investigation.
translation.it: C'erano molte cose che volevo fare nel corso dell'indagine.

translation.en: What I really wanted to do, is I wanted to call people in the neighborhood.
translation.it: Volevo chiamare la gente del quartiere.

translation.en: And, at the time, there was something called a Haines Directory.
translation.it: Allora c'era una cosa chiamata "Elenco Haines".

translation.en: It was a big, thick book
translation.it: Era un librone alto

translation.en: and it had all the addresses and phone numbers of everybody in the city,
translation.it: con gli indirizzi e i numeri di telefono di tutti, in città.

translation.en: so I took out a map and I drew a circle...
translation.it: Così ho preso una mappa e ho disegnato un cerchio...

translation.en: so many blocks each way, in a circle around the corner where my son was killed,
translation.it: ...con degli isolati in ogni direzione intorno a dov'era morto mio figlio,

translation.en: Dauphine and Forstall.
translation.it: l'angolo tra Dauphine e Forstall.

translation.en: I went home, [sniffles] I sat on my bed...
translation.it: Sono andato a casa, mi sono seduto sul letto...

translation.en: and I started making phone calls.
translation.it: ...e ho iniziato a telefonare.

translation.en: Then when I called, half weren't home.
translation.it: Ma poi, la metà non era in casa.

translation.en: [recording] We're unable to answer your call,
translation.it: Non possiamo rispondere,

translation.en: -so speak after the beep and we'll... -[beep]
translation.it: parlate dopo il bip e vi...

translation.en: [automated voice] We're sorry, you have reached a number
translation.it: Il numero inserito non è più attivo

translation.en: that has been disconnected or is no longer in service.
translation.it: Il numero inserito non è più attivo o è inesistente.

translation.en: [woman on phone] Hello?
translation.it: Pronto?

translation.en: [Dan] Yeah, Miss Smith, this is Dan Schneider.
translation.it: Sì, sig.na Smith, sono Dan Schneider.

translation.en: You don't know me, but my son was killed
translation.it: Non mi conosce, ma mio figlio è stato ucciso

translation.en: on the corner of Dauphine and Forstall a couple of months back
translation.it: tra la Dauphine e la Forstall un paio di mesi fa

translation.en: in a red pickup truck.
translation.it: in un furgone rosso.

translation.en: [Annie] Every night, he would sit and call maybe 40 or 50 at a time or something.
translation.it: Ogni sera, si sedeva e faceva circa 40 o 50 telefonate per volta.

translation.en: [Dan] Some of 'em weren't very receptive.
translation.it: Alcuni non erano molto ricettivi.

translation.en: [man on phone] I be at work too much. I really don't know.
translation.it: Avevo lavorato fino a tardi. Non so niente.

translation.en: [woman] A week later, I heard something about that,
translation.it: L'ho sentito dire una settimana dopo,

translation.en: but I don't have any idea.
translation.it: ma non ne ho idea.

translation.en: [Dan] There was a boy named Scarface arrested for it.
translation.it: Hanno arrestato un certo Scarface.

translation.en: [woman] A boy named who?
translation.it: Come si chiama?

translation.en: Somebody might've been out there who saw something.
translation.it: Forse qualcuno ha visto qualcosa.

translation.en: Uh-uh, not here.
translation.it: Non qui.

translation.en: [Dan] A few of 'em were very sympathetic.
translation.it: Alcuni erano molto empatici.

translation.en: [man] I was sorry to hear about it, you know, 'cause, uh...
translation.it: Mi è dispiaciuto, quando l'ho saputo.

translation.en: -[Dan] Yeah, it's-- -[man] When it happened, you know, I...
translation.it: Perché quando è successo...

translation.en: I was surprised, you know. I heard the shot.
translation.it: ...ero sorpreso. Ho sentito lo sparo.

translation.en: You hear shots in this neighborhood a lot.
translation.it: Si sentono spesso spari, qui.

translation.en: -That's the way it is. -[Dan] Yeah.
translation.it: Le cose vanno così.

translation.en: -[man] It's gotten so bad, you know? -[Dan] Yeah.
translation.it: È diventato davvero brutto.

translation.en: [man] So I'm sorry to hear about your son.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per suo figlio.

translation.en: [woman] If I had heard anything, I would've let somebody in authority know,
translation.it: Se avessi saputo qualcosa, l'avrei detto alle autorità,

translation.en: because my son got killed and I know how it feels.
translation.it: perché mio figlio è stato ucciso e so com'è.

translation.en: -[Dan] Your son got killed? -[woman] My son got killed.
translation.it: - Suo figlio è stato ucciso? - È così.

translation.en: [Dan] Oh, my Lord.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah, he got killed. -[Dan] How long back?
translation.it: Sì, è stato ucciso. Quanto tempo fa?

translation.en: [woman] Uh, two years ago.
translation.it: Due anni fa.

translation.en: -I know how it feels. -[Dan] How old was he?
translation.it: - So come ci si sente. - Quanti anni aveva?

translation.en: [woman] He was 38 years old. He was my baby son.
translation.it: Aveva 38 anni, ma era il mio bambino.

translation.en: My heart goes out to you 'cause I've been through it
translation.it: Le sono vicina perché ci sono passata

translation.en: and I know how it feels. It's something I'll never get over as long as I live.
translation.it: e so come ci si sente. Non lo supererò mai.

translation.en: [Dan] I think it was my last call for the day, at the end of the list.
translation.it: Credo fosse la mia ultima chiamata del giorno, in fondo alla lista.

translation.en: [Shane] Hello?
translation.it: Pronto?

translation.en: -[Dan] Yeah, Ms. Madding? -Uh-huh.
translation.it: Sì, signora Madding?
